originalText.text:
Giselle and her team are so lovely to work with. When I travelled down from Boston for my appointment, she personally helped me find my dress. She made feel so confident and comfortable in my try-on experience, and was extremely pleasant during all of our interactions.

Lee Grebenau's dresses make you feel like a goddess, and having the option to customize them to best suit your style is like the absolute cherry on top. Giselle communicated with me mostly through email throughout the process, letting me know if there were any issues with the customizations we had planned, and offered suggestions for ways to work around it.

My wedding dress was so special to me, and I was so lucky to be able to wear it twice (we had a private wedding followed by a large event).

originalText.text: Nancy is the best and friendliest wedding dress stylist i have ever met in my journey to finding the perfect dress. I first met her at the Spina bride in Chelsea and she was extremely helpful in suggesting and fitting me for the perfect dress. I didnt know about the Lee grebenau flagship until she told me about it because when i made my first appointment i didnt know that Lee Grebenau had her own flagship with Spina bride. Nancy went ahead and booked an appointment immediately for me and she had an available consultation and fitting within a couple days of my first appointment with Spine Bride. I found the perfect dress because Nancy was able to adjust and suggest designs and modifications to suit my style and the event i was planning. I highly recommend Spina Bride and Nancy as your stylist when you go there.

originalText.text: I highly recommend Lee Grebenau. She has the most beautiful high quality detailed dresses. Nancy and Giselle are absolutely amazing and helped me find the dress of my dreams!

text.text: I highly recommend Lee Grebenau. She has the most beautiful high quality detailed dresses. Nancy and Giselle are absolutely amazing and helped me find the dress of my dreams!

originalText.text:
I flew from Orland, FL to NY just to come to SPINA Bride. I tried on some amazing dresses by designers I couldn't find anywhere else in the US. The service was amazing and they recommended I go to Lee Grebenau Flagship.

When I arrived the first thing I noticed was the ambiance, it is unlike any other and the service provided by Gisele was unmatched. Not to mention when you make an appt it is completely private and all the attention goes to helping you find a dress without any interruptions.

Gisele was accommodating and kind the entire time and styled me to perfection. I tried on one dress that I loved but had some hesitation about some parts of the design to which she enlightened me could modified since the dress was custom. She even called the designer to confirm the modifications could be made.

I walked out of there 100000% sure of my decision and I am so happy I bought a dress from them. Highly recommend.

originalText.text: My experience with LPG was phenomenal from start to finish. I pass this boutique everyday on my walk to work so I’ve been staring at the gorgeous dresses for two years and when my day finally came I was thrilled. We were so well accommodated by stylist Giselle who is just a dream to work with. She gave me great advice on what would look best on me (when I wasn’t happy with the silhouettes I thought I wanted). She was so patient with me and thorough to make sure I was happy. Can’t recommend this place enough, but know the price range before you walk in so you’re not devastated because you WILL find something you love!!
